snippet: Before his ninth-inning hit in Game 3 of the A.L.C.S., the Yankees’ Robinson Cano was 0 for 29 in his last plate appearances.
abstract: New York Yankees second baseman Robinson Cano looks for ways to end his batting slump this postseason.
lead_paragraph: Before his ninth-inning hit in Game 3 of the A.L.C.S., the Yankees’ Robinson Cano was 0 for 29 in his last plate appearances.

headline.seo: The Yankees’ Robinson Cano Searches for Clues To His Batting Slump
headline.main: Cano Searches for Clues to Playoff Batting Slump
headline.print_headline: Cano Searches for Clues To Playoff Batting Slump
